channel.title: wordpress on Lee Turner
channel.description: Recent content in wordpress on Lee Turner

item.title: Do You Bake or Fry
item.description: Before I go much further, I thought it was probably worth me putting down a few notes about my technology choices for this site. In term of website development, I have had experience of quite a few different content management systems such as b2Evolution and more recently Wordpress. I have developed plugins and templates for b2Evolution as well as contributing code to the core product back in the day. I have put more sites together in Wordpress than I care to remember - most of my clients used Wordpress in some form or other while I was working in the paid traffic/SEO industry.
